DOC.detailed_description: The scientific approach conduct retrospective cohort study patient claim diagnosis HIV , AIDS , ARC ( simply refer HIV infection ) among commercially insured people U.S. estimate IR acute MI ( AMI ) , AMI include coronary revascularization ( CR ) procedure , CVD , compare exposure HAART treatment . We also estimate rate difference ( RD ) 95 % CI study outcome event period recent , past , cumulative duration ( < 1 year , 1 - 2 year , > 2 year ) HAART exposure classification relative non-use .
